translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, we have begun our descent into Moscow.
Please turn off all portable electronic devices.
It can interfere with the plane's navigation system.
Because people have been talking outside the flight attendant...
...and word is that nobody really believes that.
Excuse my friend. He was dropped on his head as a child.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 얘가 어릴 때 머리를 다쳐서

translation.en: If these were that bad, they wouldn't let you bring them on.
translation.ko: 진짜 안 좋다면 갖고 타게 안 했겠죠

translation.en: Just, if you agree with me... ...don't unfold your arms.
translation.ko: 내 말이 맞으면 팔짱 풀지 마요

translation.en: Dude, you need an extra minute of playing "Dora the Explorer"?
translation.ko: 그런 애들 게임 안 하면 덧나냐?

translation.en: She was about to save the Crystal Kingdom.
We just experienced an electrical short.
To your right, you see electrical activity...
translation.ko: 정전 현상입니다 천둥과 번개로 인한 일시적인

translation.en: ...in the upper stratosphere. Nothing of major concern.
Due to electrical storms, all outbound flights are canceled.
When was the last time you wore that?
But I still dressed up out of solidarity.
All right, give me a Sharpie.
One of these days, I'm not gonna have a Sharpie in my bag.
translation.ko: 앞으론 매직 안 갖고 다닐 거야

translation.en: It's an exclusive social network for globe-trotting travelers.
It's a GPS-based navigation system that allows young people...
...to find the hottest bars and clubs in cities around the world.
Our expansion plans for Moscow include getting drunk, laid...
...and ending up in a Russian prison. All at the click of a button.
translation.ko: '사고 쳐서 감옥 가는 게 클릭 한 번이면 가능하죠'

translation.en: Is it me or does Cyrillic look like Klingon?
Come on. I found that freaky Zvezda joint we're gonna hit up for our victory lap.

프로그래머에 껌뻑 죽는 언니들 많을 거야
프로그래머에 껌뻑 죽는 언니들 많을 거야 좋지

translation.en: When the Russians go for this, we're a 10-million-dollar company.
translation.ko: 이 프로그램 팔면 대박 터지는 거야

translation.en: Fifty-six travelers currently logged into Moscow.
I didn't fly halfway around the world to see Americans.
translation.ko: 미국인도 있어 여기까지 와서 미국인을 꼬이긴 싫거든?

translation.en: -Tell her to go to Applebee's. -Zvezda? Zvezda.
translation.ko: 다른 데서 놀라고 해 즈베즈다? 즈베즈다 클럽...

translation.en: Have I ever let you down?
We'll let Skyler make the introductions.
Guys, what are you doing here?
Hang on. My boy just spent, like, 12 grand to develop this.
translation.ko: 벤이 가진 돈 다 털어서 만든 프로그램이야

translation.en: What the hell is going on? Looks exactly like my idea.
Yeah, I know. It's very good. It's almost perfect, thank you.
Next time, you send an NDA.
You must mean the Non-Douchebag Agreement.
Skyler, why are you doing this?
Security will help see you out.
Look at this place. I know, right?
No. This map says we're only two blocks away.
All right. Hold up, hold up.
So how did we find this place?
...if he's the one on the left.
His friend is wearing a Snuggie with a bolo tie.
If I end up some human lampshade in this guy's basement--
Relax. I'm giving you a no-lampshade guarantee.
I'm like, "We have to go up there, right?"
Screw it. Big picture, this doesn't mean shit.
Our future is exactly shit right now.
Get a huge international Matlock-ass lawyer who knows Russian law.
translation.ko: 러시아 법 잘 아는 국제변호사 쓰는 거야

translation.en: Just don't sweat it. We'll figure something out.
How can you be like that?
Like delusionally optimistic all the time.
I'm just more used to screwing up than you are.
I try and get mad at you....
Look, you can't be so naive, okay?
You come out here, everybody out here is like hungry wolves.
And you act like little lambs, you're gonna get eaten.
You may like to think of yourself as a wolf...
But the truth is, you're just a straight-up thief.
You have to understand, this is business.
Oh, thanks. Your mom left it in my room.
No human society exists without booze or religion.
translation.ko: 술과 종교가 없으면 인간 세상이 아니지

translation.en: Snuggie, 6 o'clock. I told you his friend is hot.
What happened? Are you guys millionaires or something?
Or just the loyal friend of a full-of-shit wingman?
Well, thanks for the tip. It's definitely living up to expectations.
Sean's actually the man who finds this stuff.
Can I get a lager? A beer?
Only what he learned in Rocky IV.
Anyway, I'm on my way to Nepal. Shooting photos.
-I'm trying to get them into this gallery. -You will get in.
And Nat here is my faithful assistant and my best girl.
Well, I did have other plans this summer, but they fell through...
...so I quit my job and left my mom a note.
-And here I am. -Why would you do that?
Okay, can we not talk about that?
So, what do you actually do?
He likes basking in the possibility.
Or just never having to commit to anything.
No dumb-ass faces, no peace signs. Come on now.
translation.ko: 멍청한 표정, 브이 사인 말고 제대로 해봐

translation.en: What did you do now, Sean?
Come on! Come on! Oh, my God.
Get in there. Go, go, go.
What do they want? They're killing everyone.
translation.ko: 뭘 원하는 걸까? 다 죽이고 있어

translation.en: -Where did it come from? -Annie, what's going on?

translation.ko: 볼 수가 없어 어떻게 된 거지?

translation.en: There's nowhere to go, they're everywhere.
You really think that you're the only person down here?
I'm sick and tired of your bullshit, man!
Like, the thousandth time is the charm?
How long since we heard them?
I said 27 hours, give or take an hour.
Unless you wanna stay down here pissing in tin cans forever....
translation.ko: 깡통에 오줌 싸면서 여기 계속 있을 거야?

translation.en: We're gonna head to the U.S. Embassy.
We should go to the Swedish Embassy, it's closer.
See if they have any water, food, supplies.
Just take what you can. Take this.
-Is it gonna be like this all over? -We can't be the only ones.
translation.ko: 도시 전체가 이럴까? 생존자가 있을 거야

translation.en: Do you know where we're going?
I just wish we had a plan that didn't come from some takeout menu.
Nobody's gonna find us in the storeroom.
Stay here or find your embassy. Nobody's stopping you.
There has to be more people out there.
-Oh, shit. You okay? -You okay? Just wait, guys.
Come on, we gotta keep going.
Wait, wait, wait. This way, come on.
Wait, you hear that? Come on, this way.
Go away. You will bring ghosts with you. Go away.
translation.ko: 저리 가 유령 달고 오지 마, 가

translation.en: Everyone in the city is dead.
We don't know where they are.
Do you know where you're going?
No, I think once we cross the bridge--
This doesn't inspire confidence. We don't know anything--
There's another bridge right over there.
What's important is that you and I stick together, okay?
translation.ko: 중요한 건 우리 둘이 떨어지면 안 돼

translation.en: Guys, come on. It's back this way.
-That cop car will have a better map. -Yeah.
Give me that. You're taking too long.
We don't know these things can see or hear.
We'll count off blocks from landmarks.
Where'd it go? Can you see it?
Yeah, that's the plan, right? Stick together.
It killed the dog. It killed the dog.
It's the wind. Stop freaking out!
I'm the only one freaking out here?
This wasn't how I thought my week would go.
I'm trying to keep my freak-out inside.
The faster we get to the embassy, the faster we get home.
translation.ko: 대사관에 빨리 가야 집에 갈 수 있어

translation.en: -You don't know that. -Of course they are.
Say it's like this everywhere. Five of us, we're here in Moscow and we're alive.
translation.ko: 세상이 다 이렇대도 우린 모스크바에 있고 아직 살아 있잖아

translation.en: Okay? I doubt we're the five luckiest people on the planet.
Which makes for millions of survivors in other cities all over the world.
translation.ko: 다른 나라, 다른 도시에도 생존자가 많을 거야

translation.en: It doesn't even matter anymore. Don't you understand?
I mean, we take one step outside and we're dust.
translation.ko: 한 발짝만 나가도 재로 변할 거야

translation.en: We can't even see these things.
The way it lit up... ...that cop car.
-Daytime's more dangerous than night. -We should go outside...
Not as dumb as I thought.
Looks like the embassy is about a mile away.
You gonna get it right this time?
Are you gonna be less of an asshole?
I just want us to make smart choices. That--
Is that what you call what happened at the club? Making a smart choice?
translation.ko: 클럽에서 애인 버린 것도 올바른 선택이었어?

translation.en: I think we all want to be...
But the truth is that you don't know who you are...
And I just-- I see these... ...two seconds just playing over and over and over again.
translation.ko: 문을 닫던 그 짧은 순간이 잊히지 않아

translation.en: What's the dress code for the end of the world?
Sorry, buddy. I'm gonna have to take this.
-It was close, why didn't it see us? -The glass.

translation.ko: 생체 에너지를 감지하는 거야 말 되네

translation.en: -How'd you come up with that? -I don't know, Shark Week.
My money's on they see our electric pulses...
-An electrical insulator. -Willing to bet your life on that?
Come on, come on. Let's go.
What are you--? What do you--?
What are you gonna do with that?
You know how to use that thing?
I've seen enough. Let's just get the hell out of here.
We don't know what's up there.
Or where we're going for that matter.
Listen, we need a better view.
Somewhere where we can see what's going on. What direction's safe.
You guys wanna get yourself killed?
...all reported invisible invaders. Aggressive assault strategy."
"Hardware from the underground survived their initial attack.
We salvaged what we could, hope to reconnect with Antwerp, Budapest."
"We found an Emergency Action Message from allies here in Moscow.
You said those things see electricity, so turn it off.
Please, Sean, just turn it off.
Goddamn it, okay? Those things can see it, so turn it off!
Come on. Let's find a view.
Ben? Over here, check this out.
What are they doing out there?
It's like they're digging for something.

translation.ko: 전기에 관련된 모든 걸 손대고 있어

translation.en: They gotta obey some sort of rules, have some sort of purpose.
translation.ko: 지휘를 받는 거 같아 목적이 있을 거야

translation.en: They came here with a plan.
They're out there, just have to find them.
What the hell is he doing?
He can translate the message for us.
Sean, come on. Keep to the right.
He's dead, he's dead. He's dead.
Yes, you can! You have to.
All we're doing is buying time.
That's gotta be what Skyler saw.
The sun's about to come up. No way.

translation.ko: 갈 수 있어 숀, 너 미쳤어? 스카일러 꼴 나고 싶어?

translation.en: What is wrong with you? After what just happened to Skyler?
translation.ko: 숀, 너 미쳤어? 스카일러 꼴 나고 싶어?

translation.en: -That could happen to any of us. -Listen!
That person is surviving right in... ...the middle of all this.

translation.ko: 메시지 내용을 알 수 있을 거야

translation.en: And if I'm not giving up, you're not giving up.
Do you want to die, assholes?
Come this way. Come with me.
Quickly, we must close the cage!
It's why you and Vika are still alive.
We don't really understand much Russian.
I turned on the light to attract survivors.
Mr. Sergei calls it a Faraday cage.
The steel bars ground... ...external electrical currents.
You mean it keeps them away?
They can't smell us if we're inside.
-It's a shark cage, bro. -Mr. Sergei thinks...
They are made up of lethal wave energy.
That's why they're invisible to us.
You gotta listen to this. It's repeating a broadcast or something.
translation.ko: 비카 들어봐 계속 반복해서 방송되고 있어

translation.en: A nuclear submarine... ...in the Moskva River.
Shielded nuclear power. An undersea Faraday cage.
You mean it can get us out of here?
We have to get on that sub.
A British submarine waiting in the English Channel.
We have to go when it's dark.
Gives us five, six hours. Is that enough time?
It says they are in the north end of the river.
You think we can cross the city?
Can you help me gather supplies?
We're fine. You've done this a hundred times, right?
A focused and compressed microwave beam. I calculate...
...enough high-density microwave could break up their energy field.
...and if we can connect their charge...
Take a bunch out at once.
This guy sings to his cat.
Yeah, but look at that cat. So, what do you think?
I doubt the hope of humanity lies in homegrown science.

translation.ko: 골방 과학자한테 인류 운명을 걸자? 효과가 있다면?

translation.en: -What if it blows us all up? -Yeah, but what if it works?
translation.ko: - 우리가 죽으면? - 작동만 된다면 승산 있어
집은 위층이잖아 거기까진 못 가요 숨을만한 곳을 알아요

translation.en: I know where we can hide. Come on.

translation.en: Nat, I can't move this table!
Like a big alien stun gun.
When they generate their lightning, their power drains.
Sean, just leave it. Let's go.
We have dislodged fragments, but we can only wound them.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 다치게 하는 수준밖에 안 돼

translation.en: Well, you can stay here as long as you need.
There's a submarine in the river, it leaves in the morning.
It's joining others. One from the U.S.
-You won't make it, Sean. -Why not? We made it this far.
translation.ko: 거기까진 못 가 왜요? 여기도 왔는데

translation.en: You made it as far as Academy Plaza.
And we can make it further.
Enemy territory. You can't go through. You wanna go around?
translation.ko: 절대 통과 못 해 이렇게 돌아서 간다면 5주는 걸리지

translation.en: Like this? It would take five weeks.
If your luck hasn't run out.

translation.ko: 여기 있어도 결국 죽게 돼 있어요

translation.en: When the enemy are this strong...
...we can strike and run. Watching for weaknesses.
translation.ko: 놈들이 강하면 치고 빠지면 돼 약점을 노리고

translation.en: We return to camp, but we never retreat.

translation.ko: 내일 죽을 수도 있지 하지만 오늘은

translation.en: ...we will kill at least one of the enemy.
I'm sorry, we cannot help you.
I know you think we don't have a chance...
Sean's right, we have to try.
We wouldn't be here if it wasn't for you.
But what is the point in saving people if you don't see them home?
translation.ko: 근데 집에 못 간다면 구해주는 의미가 뭐죠?

translation.en: Your mission is to dig in here... ...so you can die in a slightly different way?
translation.ko: 조금 더 오래 살다가 여기서 죽는 게 좋아요?

translation.en: Here's our mission. We're gonna get on that submarine...
...get together with other survivors out there...
So why don't we get on that sub and get you and your men some real weapons?
You have command until we get back.
We will drift to the submarine.
It's okay. It's not your fault.
He was in the smart class.
His mom made him play with me.
I sort of never got over it.
I never got a chance to say it to Ben.
This is why they came. We're just in the way.
We're gonna. It's our way out.
Her name's Natalie. She must have swam ashore upriver.
I watched your boat go over.
I don't want to lose this one.

translation.ko: - 놓칠 순 없어 - 그냥은 못 가요

translation.en: I had orders not to depart without survivors.
-I'll speak to him. Where is he? -Dead.
Look, I'm not asking you to go out there, okay?
This area is infested! I'm sorry.
-Her chances for survival are not good. -She knows how to hide. Trust me.
translation.ko: - 살아 있을 가망성이 낮아 - 숨는 법을 알아요

translation.en: He knows what his chances are.
And right now, every one of us count.
If she was one of yours, you'd want the same.
Okay. Let's get under and make a battle plan.
The new gun is almost ready.
The extra microwave gun gives us a chance.
...thought we could microwave their invisible shield.
...Mr. Sergei said that we need much more power.

You will get four or five shots.
We need to wrap the power packs so they don't short out.
Get the lead blankets out of radiation....
We get to where the flares were fired, here...
Her flares came from that direction.

translation.en: Wait until they're over the water to fire the gun.

Go, and teach the others what we know.
This is the last day of the extermination...
I have Moscow at my back.
Yes, I replaced the damaged parts.

Here in London, I picked up signals from others around the globe.
